fields.headline: For the record
fields.bodyText: Winchester city council has 17 Conservative councillors, not two, as we said. The Liberal Democrats have 27 and there is one independent (“Distrust of Johnson haunts the Tories in a Remainer city”, News, 3 November, page 11). Write to the Readers’ Editor, the Observer, York Way, London N1 9GU, email observer.readers@observer.co.uk, tel 020 3353 4736
